entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
